item.description:
A workshop in the Organizer's home. The agenda for this month:

1. Our own recent writing . . . please bring copies to share!
2. Apollinaire’s “Zone”
3. Recent topics which deserve to be written

Since this bullet list is both flexible and not comprehensive, we might very well go anywhere poetic.

Limited parking is available. Easily accessible on the Green Line. Please e-mail the Organizer for directions and more specific information if you are interested in attending.
item.name: August: Discussion at Nine Devotion
